main event: A cigar-shaped UFO was observed over Aurora, Colorado, on February 8, 1962.
interesting points: The UFO was first sighted at 1950R with no sound or trail observed., The object was approximately 1/4 mile away and exhibited smooth, silent motion., It was observed through 8-power binoculars at an altitude of 5-600 feet., The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes before the object was lost to sight., There are multiple possible classifications such as balloon, aircraft, or astronomical.
witness description: not specified as the primary witness information is lacking
